newsitem.title: USA: Nematron, Wonderware reach marketing pact.
newsitem.headline: Nematron, Wonderware reach marketing pact.

text.p: Nematron Corp said Monday it entered into a cooperative marketing agreement with Wonderware Corp of Irvine, Calif.
Nematron's Pentium and Pentium Pro line of industrial control computers were selected as a hardware platform for all of Wonderware's software products.

The company, demonstrating its wares at the Instrument Society of America trade show in Chicago, also said it formed a strategic alliance with S-S Technologies Inc of Kitchener, Ontario, Canada, that will allow Nematron to use S-S's Direct-Link interface in bundled OpenControl systems.
In addition, both companies will continue to work together to share product and tehnical information, jointly market products and further discuss product partnerships.
